summaryArticle: Our project is written in Next / JS framework. This is a react with built-in features, such as easy routing, simple server side, simple file serving, and much more. Also, the project used the redux library together with thunk to create a single application state and the fashionable i18 library for easy translation of the application into various languages.
shykiCardText: Main structure. Map. Store. Countries table. Adaptive
